name: Social Platform
short_description:
"Social Platform".... a person-oriented, capability-based social space for sharing and interacting.
The Social Platform connects people in intuitive and seamless ways in support of the "native cyberspace" generation.
The Social Platform is a networking platform that consists of social nodes, each of which represents an element that belongs in a social graph. Just think about the way we interact in society and the tools that we use to do so. The Social Platform lets us do the same using similar concepts in cyberspace.
summary: The Social Platform improves how people interact in the digital domain
